lede: Gross domestic product (GDP) is a measure of economic activity which captures the value of goods and services that a country produces during a given period.

bulletins.summary: Preliminary estimate for Gross Domestic Product (GDP) containing constant price Gross Value Added (GVA) data for the UK. Data is available split by industrial sector.
bulletins.name: GDP Preliminary Estimate Q3 2014

datasets.summary: High level overview of the economy
datasets.name: Gross Domestic Product data collection

name: Gross Domestic Product (GDP)
